meteringrange: 0 to 20 EV (Matrix or center-weighted metering at ISO 100 equivalent, f/1.4 lens, at 20°C/68°F) 2 to 20 EV (Spot metering at ISO 100 equivalent, f/1.4 lens at 20°C/68°F)
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing AE-L/AF-L button Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF)
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit such as SB-910, SB-900, SB-400, SB-300, SB-80DX, SB-28DX or SB-50DX is fully charged
compatiblelenses: AF NIKKOR for F3AF not Supported. AF-S, AF-I: All Functions Supported. AI-P NIKKOR: All Functions Supported Except Autofocus and 3D Color Matrix Metering II. Electronic rangefinder can be used if Maximum Aperture is f/5.6 or Faster. IX NIKKOR Lenses Cannot be Used. Non-CPU: Autofocus not supported. Can be used in mode M, but exposure meter does not function. Other AF NIKKOR: All Functions Supported Except autofocus and 3D Color Matrix Metering II. Type G or D AF NIKKOR: All Functions Supported Except Autofocus. Type D PC NIKKOR: All Functions Supported Except Autofocus and some Shooting Modes.
frameadvancerate: Up to 5 fps (manual focus, mode M or S, shutter speed 1/250 sec or faster, and other settings at default values)
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
weight: Camera Body: 430 g (15.1 oz) Lens: 195 g (6.9 oz)
autofocussystem: Nikon Multi-CAM 1000 autofocus sensor module with TTL phase detection
selftimer: 2, 5, 10, 20 sec.; 1 to 9 exposures Timer duration electronically controlled
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 420-pixel RGB sensor is available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, SB-400 or SB-300; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighted metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
focusmodes: Auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A) Continuous-servo (AF-C) Face-Priority AF available in Live View only and D-Movie only Full-time Servo (AF-A) available in Live View only Manual (M) with electronic rangefinder Normal area available in Live View and D-Movie only Predictive focus tracking activated automatically according to subject status Single-servo AF (AF-S) Wide area available in Live View and D-Movie only
pictureangle: Nikon DX format (Effective picture angle 1.5x [Approx.] conversion factor)
interface: Accessory Terminal: Remote Cord: MC-DC2 (available separately); GPS unit: GP-1A (available separately) Audio input: Stereo mini-pin jack (3.5-mm diameter) HDMI output: Type C mini-pin HDMI connector Hi-speed USB Video Output: NTSC, PAL
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Brazilian, Portuguese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norweigan, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
incameraimageediting: Color Balance Color Outline Color Sketch D-Lighting Distortion Control Filter Effects Fisheye Image Overlay Miniature Effect Monochrome NEF (RAW) Processing Perspective Control Photo Illustration Quick Retouch Red-Eye Correction Resize Selective Color Straighten Trim
meteringmethod: Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 8 mm circle in center of frame Matrix: 3D color matrix metering II (type G and D lenses); color matrix metering II (other CPU lenses) Spot: Meters 3.5 mm circle (about 2.5% of frame) centered on selected focus point
liveviewafareamode: Face-priority AF Wide-area AF Normal-area AF Subject-tracking AF
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VII screen
movieaudio: Built-in microphone, monaural Optional external stereo mini-pin jack (3.5mm diameter) Microphone sensitivity can be adjusted
exposuremeteringsystem: TTL exposure metering using 420-pixel RGB sensor
liveviewlensservo: Autofocus: Single-servo AF (AF-S); full-time-servo AF (AF-F) Manual focus (MF)
liveviewautofocus: Contrast-detect AF anywhere in frame (camera selects focus point automatically when face-priority AF or subject-tracking AF is selected)
picturecontrol: Landscape Monochrome Neutral Portrait Selected Picture Control can be Modified Standard Vivid
playbackfunctions: Auto Image Rotation Full-Frame and Thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images or calendar) Highlights Histogram Display Image Comment Movie Playback Playback with Zoom Slideshow
shutterreleasemodes: Continuous Delayed remote Quick Response Remote Mode Quiet shutter-release Self-timer Mode Single-frame [S] mode
dimensionswxhxd: Camera Body: 124 x 98 x 75.5 mm (4.9" x 3.9" x 3.0") Lens (Diameter x Length): 59.5 x 66 mm (2.3" x 2.6")
lensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); Continuous-servo AF (AF-C); auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A); predictive focus tracking activated automatically according to subject status Manual focus (MF): Electronic rangefinder can be used
flashcompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
filesystem: Compliant with DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0 DPOF (Digital Print Order Format) EXIF 2.3 (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras)
scenemodes: Auto Auto [Flash Off] Child Close-up Landscape Night Portrait Portrait Sports
moviemetering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
flashsyncmodes: Auto Auto with red-eye reduction Auto slow sync Auto slow sync with red-eye reduction Fill-flash Rear-curtain sync Rear-curtain with slow sync Red-Eye reduction Red-Eye reduction with slow sync Slow sync Off
acadapter: EH-5b AC Adapter; requires EP-5A Power Connector (available separately)
exposuremodes: Aperture-Priority Auto (A) Auto Auto (flash off) Manual (M) Programmed Auto with flexible Program (P) Shutter-Priority Auto (S)
whitebalance: Auto Cloudy Direct Sunlight Flash Fluorescent (7 types) Incandescent Preset Manual Shade
